name: Memories From Beyond a Coral Sea
name_original: Memories From Beyond a Coral Sea
description:
Explore your way through mystical islands while learning about your characters past. In this short adventure game you play as the protagonist of a memoire, telling a story from the pacific in the late 1800 century.

The game requires a play area of at least 2x2 m.
Finishing the game takes around 45 minutes to 2 hours depending on how you play.

It has to be completed in one session since there is no save function.
We recommend taking your time, playing the game without stress in a calm environment.

We hope you like it!



Features include:
Voice acted story, Immersive environment, Beautiful soundtrack by film score composer
